props.name: name
props.description: A unique identifier for the menu

props.name: divider
props.description: Modifies an item to have a full bleed divider between it and the next list item

props.name: effect
props.description: Applies ripple click effect to option links

props.name: position
props.description: Positions menu above or below button { 0: 'bottom-left', 1: 'top-left', 2: 'top-right', 3: 'bottom-right' }

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the menu text and can contain HTML

slots.name: icon
slots.description: The icon slot holds the menu icon and can contain HTML

events.name: clicked
events.description: Dispatched when the menu is clicked
